title: Icons
text: Used to represent a Combat Manoeuvre or Ability that affects models on the battlefield. They are positioned on the battlefield on an unoccupied hex, and have a physical presence in-game. Whereas Markers generally move with the models that they have been applied to, Icons generally stay in the hex where they were placed. Unless otherwise stated, Icons with the same name, applied by the same Warband do not stack to provide a cumulative effect.
